definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: An unenforced relationship is represented in a database diagram by a dashed line.
sentences.chinese: 非強制關係在數據庫關係圖中由虛線表示。

sentences.english: A broken blue line means the course of a waterless valley .
sentences.chinese: 藍色虛線代表無水流過的山谷。

sentences.english: This is exactly what our blue dashed line represents.
sentences.chinese: 而這正是我們藍色虛線所代表的。

sentences.english: shown here as a dashed black line, heading downwards.
sentences.chinese: 此處顯示爲虛線黑線，標題向下。

sentences.english: You then break up the frame's content section into horizontal operands separated by a dashed line.
sentences.chinese: 然後你把框架的內容段用虛線分爲水平操作元。

sentences.english: This arbitrary process fragment is denoted with the dotted box.
sentences.chinese: 此任意的流程片斷由虛線框表示。

sentences.english: I'll pick up wherever the dotted line emerges in the subsequent lecture.
sentences.chinese: 下節課我會把劃虛線的部分接着講完。

sentences.english: These margins often show up as light solid or dashed lines on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在屏幕上這些邊線可能會顯示爲淺色的實線或虛線。

sentences.english: Position by aligning the slotted line to the hem or fold line marking. Fuse.
sentences.chinese: 以底邊的虛線或直折線定位粘雙面粘合襯。

sentences.english: Just put your name on the dotted line and we'll be set.
sentences.chinese: 就在虛線上簽字吧，這樣我們就辦妥了。

sentences.english: There is a 10-dash-line in the Chinese oldmap showing Hawaii belong to China too.
sentences.chinese: 中國舊地圖上的10虛線表明夏威夷也是中國的。

sentences.english: The appearance of a black dotted bordered rectangle denotes that the editor has identified the datatype with the connection.
sentences.chinese: 黑色虛線框的出現表示編輯器識別了連接的數據類型。

sentences.english: Why do some maps have dotted borders?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有些地圖有虛線邊界？

sentences.english: Have you noticed that a lot of corporate organizational charts are littered with dotted lines?
sentences.chinese: 您是否注意到許多公司的組織圖表充滿雜亂的虛線？

sentences.english: The dashed line indicates the maximum exposure of land during marine lowstands. Click for larger image.
sentences.chinese: 虛線顯示海洋處於低水位時暴露的陸地部分。

sentences.english: He dotted a line across the map.
sentences.chinese: 他在地圖上劃了一條橫虛線。

definition: to break the door down and enter (idiom)
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
